forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 52. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a calm clarity envelops the city. The overnight skies, now devoid of clouds, promise an inviting day ahead. Currently, the temperature sits at a mild 52 degrees, accompanied by a gentle south-southwest breeze whispering through the streets. The serenity is punctuated by the distant silhouettes of landmarks, suggesting an unobstructed view of the captivating Golden Gate Bridge, which beckons outdoor enthusiasts to explore its surroundings.

By midday, the sun will fully awaken, teasing the air to warm up to a comfortable 67 degrees, only to taper off slightly as the afternoon descends. This transition will be complemented by light gusts from the southwest, subtly stirring the air. As the marine layer retreats to reveal clear vistas, residents might find themselves delighting in the splendid weather suited for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps seeking solace in one of the vibrant local parks. Dressing in layers is ideal; a light sweater paired with breathable fabrics will accommodate the warming sun while remaining prepared for the brisk morning air. Whether sipping coffee at a quaint café or indulging in an afternoon book at a sunny spot, today radiates warmth and potential.
